EmailTemplate.name: Homelessness in PHA
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: February 27, 2018 - El Barrio es Nuestro Community Engagement Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Community Partners,
We appreciate everyone's active participation and enthusiasm in working together to eradicate the blight, vandalism, and social ills affecting the quality of life in our community.
Below you will find a brief questionnaire regarding your attendance to our next community meeting. Please take a few seconds to fill it out.
Homelessness in Philadelphia
falta de vivienda en Filadelfia
We look forward to your participation.
If you wish you to unsubscribe from future Gurney Campaign emails, please click here.
